H0.text: Where was the first annual G6 leaders summit (which later became the G8) held in 1975. United States

H1.text: Where was the first annual G6 leaders summit (which later became the G8) held in 1975. United Kingdom

H2.text: Where was the first annual G6 leaders summit (which later became the G8) held in 1975. Germany

H3.text: Where was the first annual G6 leaders summit (which later became the G8) held in 1975. FRANCE

A4.text: The 1st G6 summit took place on 15–17 November 1975, in Rambouillet, France.

A5.text: The venue for the summit meetings was the Château de Rambouillet near Paris.
